mapper.select: select tuser.id as id, tuser.user_name as userName, tuser.password as password, tuser.name as name, tuser.age as age, tuser.birthday as birthday, tuser.sex as sex, tuser.created as created, tuser.updated as updated from tb_user tuser where tuser.user_name = #{userName} AND tuser.password=#{password};
